top_comments.comment: Just go with it and go all in on snowy mountain

comments_since_last_sample.body: Lol I love how Ren is STILL rocking his Blue Shades from last seasons Button Game... xD

Ren what I've seen about the "pay-in-the-barrel" thing is that most hermits are confused what barrel to pay in. Placing signs on top of the correct barrel (lighting up the text) with an arrow pointing into the correct barrel might work.
Lol hermits doing hermit things and not paying in the barrels as signs say... its almost like a demonstration of the reloader system should have part of the grand opening lol...
That feel when the CFO says "fellow CEO" xD. #PayInTheBarrel
